title: Drawing, "Six Lamps in Classical Style", 1540
medium:
Pen and brown ink, brown wash
Support: paper, off-white, laid down
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Six oil lamps each with a small head with an open mouth as the spout, all spouts are turned to the right.
